resources.string: To start a game, simply press the button Create Game and enter the parameters of your game. Once this is done, you will be sent to the lobby screen of your game.

To join an ongoing game, just press the button Join Game in the entry screen. You will be brought to the games page and simply have to refresh the list to see the ongoing games up to 300m around you. You can select any one and jump into the lobby.

Once in the lobby, you can either start the game (if you are the one that created the game) or send invitations by pressing the button Send Invites. Once the game is started, you will be brought to the main game screen.

Once in the game, you have a timer displaying the time left along with your score and a button TAG. pressing that button will send a signal to the server to use your location and orientation to tag your adversaries. The more people you tag, the more points you get. At the end of the timer, the end game screen is displayed with the leaderboard.

You can receive invitations concerning the game. When sending invitations, use the username of the other player. He will receive an in-game invitation and can use it once to join your game. This is especially important if the game is private and therefore not displayed in the game list in Join Game

To tag, orientate your phone to the other player also holding his phone and press the button TAG, if the player is in range and in your orientation, he will be tagged and you gain points. The game is not too different from laser tag so if you are used to it, the transition will be easy.
To leave the lobby, simply press the back button on your phone. In game, use the exit button. It will display a dialog menu. You will not lose your points but you will be removed from the lobby.
